mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.phone AS "phone", a.verify_code AS "verifyCode", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.out_time AS "outTime"
mapper.select: select count(0) from member_verify_code a where a.out_time > now() and a.phone=#{telPhone} and a.verify_code=#{verifyCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_verify_code( id, phone, verify_code, create_date, out_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{phone}, #{verifyCode}, #{createDate}, #{outTime} )
